body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Fees & Passes              Fees & Passes        Park rangers provide guided tours of the Wesleyan Chapel. For more information, please stop by the Visitor Center. NPS photo          Did you know Women's Rights National Historical Park is one of many fee free national parks in the United States?  We hope you enjoy your visit!                  Women's Rights National Historical Park does not distribute America the Beautiful Interagency Passes, but you can visit here to find a distribution site near you! NOTE: we recommend calling a site prior to your arrival to ensure the passes are in stock. If you plan to visit other parks with an entrance fee, take the opportunity to learn more about the America the Beautiful Interagency Pass series.            ATB Interagency Annual Pass: $80            ATB Interagency Military Pass: FREE           ATB Interagency Senior Pass: $10             ATB Interagency Access Pass: FREE            ATB Interagency Volunteer Pass: FREE
title: Women's Rights National Historical Park: Fees & Passes
